Dam Agent 0:53 by Bryan Bosshardt

Watch on YouTube

  • Achieved: 27 September 2002
  • System: NTSC
  • Rank: 1st (100 points)
  • Player's comments:
    Time was untied when set. Vid linked is a 53 done with modern strats. The first boost wasn't very good + meh double gates, but the 2nd boost was very good and everything else after was pretty solid overall. I believe this is a 53.3-53.5, but it's very difficult to gauge decimals on this level and could be wrong.

    Original Dam 53 run done with 1.2 can be seen in link below:
    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Sdirncq5I4

    Another 1.2 run that was linked on the rankings for some years can be seen in link below:
    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gJx4EGsftc
